original_text: And now, I pray you, consider from this day and upward, from before a stone was laid upon a stone in the temple of the Lord:
korean_text: 이제 원하건대 너희는 오늘부터 이전 곧 여호와의 전에 돌이 돌 위에 놓이지 아니하였던 때를 기억하라

sentences.original_text: consider from this day and upward,
from before a stone was laid upon a stone
in the temple of the Lord:
